title.rendered: CareFirst names Dr. Tich Changamire as Chief Medical Officer

content.rendered: We are pleased to announce that our client, CareFirst, Inc., the largest healthcare insurer in the Mid-Atlantic region, serving 3.4 million members, hired Dr. Tich Changamire to be their next Chief Medical Officer. Dr. Changamire comes to CareFirst from Humana where he was most recently Chief Medical Officer for the Medicaid business in Louisiana and South Carolina.  Prior to that role, he was a CMO in the Office of Chief Medical Officer with Humana.  His role at CareFirst will be to drive quality innovation through program development, provider engagement and executive leadership across the enterprise.

Dr. Changamire comes to CareFirst from Humana where he was most recently Chief Medical Officer for the Medicaid business in Louisiana and…
